action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
National Fish and Wildlife Foundation Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill reauthorizes through FY2024 the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation and revises requirements governing the foundation.
